title: aNDip-paNiya vandEnE
sahitya:
aNDip-paNiya vandEnE ayyanE undanaDiyai daNDAyudam tAngi ten pazhani OngumaiyE


anupallavi

  toNDan endanai nI kaNDadumE irakkam koNDiDuvAi enru kenjit-tanjam enru


caraNam    arivIna ahankAra Anavat-timir mIri siriyEn idukArum sheida pizhai ellAm
poruttavaTrai nAn pOkkum tirattaip-pera aruL purindu ennai AtkoLLumAru kOri
